name: WhiteNoise
description: White noise generator. Generates random values at full sample rate with equal distribution across all frequencies.

name: PinkNoise
description: Pink noise generator. Generates noise with equal energy per octave (1/f spectrum).

name: BrownNoise
description: Brown noise generator. Generates noise with a 1/fÂ² spectrum, also called red or Brownian noise.

name: GrayNoise
description: Gray noise generator. Generates noise that sounds equally loud at all frequencies to the human ear.

name: Dust
description: Random impulse generator. Generates random impulses from 0 to +1 at a rate determined by the density argument.

inputs.name: density
inputs.description: Average number of impulses per second

name: LFNoise0
description: Step noise generator. Generates random levels at a rate given by freq. Holds each value for 1/freq seconds.

inputs.name: freq
inputs.description: Approximate rate at which to generate random values

name: LFNoise1
description: Linear interpolated noise generator. Generates random levels that are linearly interpolated.

inputs.name: freq
inputs.description: Approximate rate at which to generate random values

name: LFNoise2
description: Quadratic noise generator. Generates random levels with quadratic interpolation between them.

inputs.name: freq
inputs.description: Approximate rate at which to generate random values

name: Dust2
description: Bipolar random impulse generator. Generates random impulses from -1 to +1.

inputs.name: density
inputs.description: Average number of impulses per second

name: ClipNoise
description: Clip noise generator. Generates noise with only two values: -1 and +1.

name: Crackle
description: Chaotic noise generator. A noise generator based on a chaotic function with parameter control.

inputs.name: chaosParam
inputs.description: Chaos parameter from 1.0 to 2.0. Values from 1.5 to 1.9 produce interesting sounds

name: LFClipNoise
description: Dynamic clip noise generator. Generates noise that switches between -1 and +1 at a given frequency.

inputs.name: freq
inputs.description: Approximate rate at which to generate random values

name: LFDNoise0
description: Dynamic step noise generator. Like LFNoise0 but can have frequency modulation.

inputs.name: freq
inputs.description: Approximate rate at which to generate random values

name: LFDNoise1
description: Dynamic linear interpolated noise. Like LFNoise1 but with frequency modulation support.

inputs.name: freq
inputs.description: Approximate rate at which to generate random values

name: LFDNoise3
description: Dynamic cubic interpolated noise. Generates random levels with cubic interpolation and frequency modulation support.

inputs.name: freq
inputs.description: Approximate rate at which to generate random values

name: Hasher
description: Hash function random generator. Returns a number from 0 to 1 based on a hash of the input value.
